alert.note: Alert for Clay; Union (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 05 at 2:50PM MDT until July 05 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN SIOUX...WESTERN PLYMOUTH...DIXON...CLAY... SOUTHEASTERN YANKTON AND UNION COUNTIES... At 348 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Union Grove State Park to 6 miles south of Wynot, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 328 pm, a 65 mph wind gust was reported 2 miles west-southwest of Gayville. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. These severe storms will be near... Alcester and Union Grove State Park around 355 PM CDT. Hawarden and Newcastle around 405 PM CDT. Akron around 410 PM CDT. Elk Point, Ireton, Martinsburg and Ponca State Park around 415 PM CDT. Ponca and Craig around 420 PM CDT. Jefferson around 425 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Gayville, St. Helena Boat Dock, Chatsworth, Waterbury and Westfield. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Wind damage with these storms will occur before any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover. SEEK SHELTER IMMEDIATELY inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
